sentences.sContent: The constitution also confers large powers on Brazil's 25 constituent states.
sentences.sCn: 宪法还授予巴西25个成员州极大的权力。

sentences.sContent: ...Why does the author deem it inappropriate for Harvard to confer air honorary degree on Oprah Winfrey...

remMethod.val: con(共同) ＋ fer(带来， 拿来) → 带来观点一起商议 → 商议

trans.tranOther: to officially give someone a title etc, especially as a reward for something they have achieved
